actions.description: The sea serpent makes one Bite attack and one Constrict or Tail attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (2d12 + 7) piercing damage plus 6 (1d12) cold damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 12 to hit, reach 20 ft., one creature. Hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 20). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the sea serpent can't constrict another target.
actions.name: Constrict

actions.description: 12 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (1d12 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 30 feet away from the sea serpent and knocked prone.
actions.name: Tail

actions.description: The sea serpent exhales a 60-foot cone of cold. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 49 (9d10) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Rime Breath (Recharge 5-6)

actions.description: The sea serpent makes one Tail attack.
actions.name: Tail

actions.description: The sea serpent makes one Bite attack
actions.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)

specialTraits.description: If the sea serpent fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)

specialTraits.description: The sea serpent deals double damage to objects and structures.
specialTraits.name: Siege Monster
